info.title: Pinboard
info.description: Store, manage and share bookmarks on Pinboard

get.description: Returns the most recent time a bookmark was added, updated or deleted. Use this before calling posts/all to see if the data has changed since the last fetch.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL of the item.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Title of the item. This field is unfortunately named 'description' for backwards compatibility with the delicious API.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: Description of the item. Called 'extended' for backwards compatibility with delicious API.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: List of up to 100 tags.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: Creation time for this bookmark. Defaults to current time. Datestamps more than 10 minutes ahead of server time will be reset to current server time.

parameters.name: replace
parameters.description: Replace any existing bookmark with this URL. Default is yes. If set to no, will throw an error if bookmark exists.

parameters.name: shared
parameters.description: Make bookmark public. Default is "yes" unless user has enabled the "save all bookmarks as private" user setting, in which case default is "no".

parameters.name: toread
parameters.description: Marks the bookmark as unread. Default is "no".

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL of the item.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filter by up to three tags.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: Return results bookmarked on this day.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Return bookmark for this URL.

parameters.name: meta
parameters.description: Include a change detection signature in a meta attribute (yes/no).

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Default is xml.

get.description: Returns one or more posts on a single day matching the arguments. If no date or url is given, date of most recent bookmark will be used.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filter by up to three tags.

get.description: Returns a list of dates with the number of posts at each date.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filter by up to three tags.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of results to return. Default is 15, max is 100.

get.description: Returns a list of the user's most recent posts, filtered by tag.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filter by up to three tags.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Offset value (default is 0).

parameters.name: results
parameters.description: Number of results to return. Default is all.

parameters.name: fromdt
parameters.description: Return only bookmarks created after this time.

parameters.name: todt
parameters.description: Return only bookmarks created before this time.

parameters.name: meta
parameters.description: Include a change detection signature for each bookmark.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Default is xml.

get.description: Returns all bookmarks in the user's account.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL of the item.

get.description: Returns a list of popular tags and recommended tags for a given URL. Popular tags are tags used site-wide for the url; recommended tags are drawn from the user's own tags.
Returns a full list of the user's tags along with the number of times they were used.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: The tag to delete.

parameters.name: old
parameters.description: The tag to rename. Note: match is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: new
parameters.description: The new name. If empty, nothing will happen.

get.description: Rename an tag, or fold it in to an existing tag.
Get the secret RSS token (allows viewing user's private RSS feeds).

info.title: Pinboard
info.description: Store, manage and share bookmarks on Pinboard
